name: redact-pii
description: Remove personally identifiable information from text.

scripts.test: mocha --grep '\[integration\]' --invert -s 20 --timeout 10000 --reporter spec --require test/bootstrap test/*.test.js test/**/*.test.js && prettier './+(bin|lib|test)/**/*.js' --list-different
scripts.test:coverage: istanbul cover ./node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --require test/bootstrap test/*.test.js test/**/*.test.js

author: Patrick Hulce <patrick.hulce@gmail.com>
